actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the issuance of depositor protection tax-exempt bonds.
short_title: Qualified Depositor Protection Bond Act of 1991

summary.text: Qualified Depositor Protection Bond Act of 1991 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the issuance of tax-exempt qualified depositor protection bonds to repay depositors not otherwise insured in an insolvent financial institution located in a qualifying State or to assist the reopening of closed financial institutions in such State. Describes a qualifying State as one in which the Governor declares a bank holiday for a period of not less than five consecutive business days at no less than one-third of the State's financial institutions.

titles.title: Qualified Depositor Protection Bond Act of 1991
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the issuance of depositor protection tax-exempt bonds.
